# Data Source: auth0_action_module_actions

Data source to retrieve all actions that are using a specific Auth0 action module.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `module_id` (String) The ID of the action module.

### Read-Only

- `actions` (List of Object) List of actions using this module. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--actions))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `total` (Number) The total number of actions using this module.

<a id="nestedatt--actions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `actions`

Read-Only:

- `action_id` (String)
- `action_name` (String)
- `module_version_id` (String)
- `module_version_number` (Number)
- `supported_triggers` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--actions--supported_triggers))

<a id="nestedobjatt--actions--supported_triggers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `actions.supported_triggers`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String)
- `version` (String)
